original_text: For they were about five thousand men. And he said to his disciples, Make them sit down by fifties in a company.
korean_text: 이는 남자가 한 오천 명 됨이러라 제자들에게 이르시되 떼를 지어 한 오십 명씩 앉히라 하시니

sentences.original_text: For they were about five thousand men.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 약 오천 명의 남자들이었기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: And he said to his disciples,
Make them sit down by fifties in a company.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 오십 명씩 한 조가 되어 앉히십시오.
